1.「おお <cs_pchero>さんではありませんか。| まさか ここで お会いで: Oh, it's not <cs_pchero>. I didn't|expect to see you here!

2.「王者のこてを必要とする 冒険者がいると| 不思議な声が心に響いたので 来てみた:
I came because a mysterious voice echoed in|my mind that there was an adventurer who|needed a champion's trowel, and it was|
|.

3.「メギストリスを危機から救った 恩人である| <cs_pchero>さんの 導き:
I am here to ask for an audience with the|great King Epath, to be guided by the great|, the benefactor who saved|
|Megistris from peril.

4.「像に宿りし エパト王の魂よ。| メギストリスを守る 偉大な王よ。| どうか 我: King Epaphat in the statue. Great protector|of Megistris. Please answer my call!

5.<center>我は エパト王……。|かつて このメギストリスを統治し|長きに渡: I am King Epath. I who once ruled over|Megistris, and long have I watched over it.

6.<center>我が問いに答え 王としての資質を示せ。|さすれば 貴公を|始まり: Answer my question, my qualities as a king.|And you will be my guide to the Tower of|Beginnings.

8.<center>……我が末裔に問う。|国とは いかなるものか？: ... My Descendants. What is a country?

9.「国…………。| 国とは そこに住む者の幸せを守るものです。: Country. A country protects the happiness of|its inhabitants.

10.<center>……ならば さらに問う。|王とは いかなるものか？: ... Then, moreover... What is a king?

12.<center>……なるほど。貴公の考えは わかった。|だが 王者のこてが眠る塔:
... I'm not. I know what you're thinking.|But to pave the way to the tower where the|Iron Hand rests, you'll have to pay a steep|
|price.

13.<center>代償とは すなわち|王自らの命を ささげること……。: The price is the king's own life.

14.<center>貴公のそばにいる その者は この世界を救う|王者となるに ふさわ: The man by your side is the one who will|save the world, the one who deserves to be|its champion.

15.<center>貴公は 先ほど 国のため|そこに住む 人々の幸せを守るため|自己: You said earlier that a king sacrifices|himself for his country and the well-being|of its people.

16.<center>ならば 世界のため 人々の幸せのために|自らの死をもって 王者の: Then, for the sake of the world and the|happiness of others, I will die to make way|for a champion. I end my life here and now.

20.「私の身に宿る命は 父と母が命がけで| 私に与えてくれた命。: My father and mother risked their lives to|give me the life I carry.

21.「そして 私は この命で| この国の人々を守っていくのです。: And I will use my life to protect the people|of this country.

22.「ご先祖さまの おっしゃることとはいえ| そんな要求を のむわけにはいきません。: I can't just agree to your request, even|though my ancestors told me to. Show me|other conditions.

24.<center>まこと 現世の王に ふさわしき答えなり。|その若さで そこまで国:
A fitting answer for the king of this world.|That he should think so much of his country|at such a young age! The people of this land|
|are blessed with a good king.

26.<center>貴公を 正当なる王として認めよう。|我が子孫よ……メギストリスを: I now recognize you as the rightful king. My|descendants... Megistris.

27.「<cs_pchero>さん。ぼくが導き手として| 始まりの塔への道を 開きます: I will lead the way to the Tower of|Beginnings.

28.「その玉を 像に掲げてみてください。: Raise that ball up to the statue.

32.<center>しかし 王者が必要とされる時代が|ふたたび 訪れようとは……。|: But how could the time of need for champions|ever come again? A time of rest will not|last.

33.<center>王にも王者にも 恵まれている時代だ。|いかなる困難が訪れようとも:
We are blessed with a king and a champion.|Whatever challenges may come, we believe|that the people of this age will overcome|
|them.

35.<center>よくぞ 守護鬼を倒した。|貴公こそが 現世の王者にふさわしい。: Well done, guardian demon. You're the king|of this world.

37.<center>まがまがしい邪気に 感づかれる前に|この塔は ふたたび 閉ざすと: This tower will be closed once again before|its evil eye can sense it. And I will give|you the cross-dimension ball.

40.<cs_pchero>のもとに 天から|光に包まれた武具が 降りてきた。: A light-embellished armament descends from|the heavens to the <cs_pchero>.
